title: ENCODE Nucleic Acid Library
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE Nucleic Acid Library

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

biosample.description: Biosample from which this library was derived or isolated.
biosample.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
biosample.title: Biosample

type.title: Nucleic Acid Type
type.comment: These will be SO (sequence ontology) terms were possible, but only a small subset

term_id.description: The ID of the SO (Sequence Ontology) term best matching the nucleic acid type
term_id.title: SO Term ID

source.description: Source or Vendor of Nucleic Acid Library
source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Library Source

lot_id.description: A vendor's id code for the nucleic acid library lot
lot_id.title: Library lot ID

documents.description: List of library prep and other protocols

items.description: A library prep or other protocol document
items.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE document UUID or unique document name
items.title: Protocol Document

documents.title: List of Protocol Documents

nucleic_acid_starting_quantity.description: Starting amount of nucleic acid before selection and purification
nucleic_acid_starting_quantity.title: Starting Quantity

extraction_method.description: A short description of the nucleic acid extraction method used in Library prep.
extraction_method.title: Extraction Method

fragmentation_method.description: A short description of the nucleic acid fragmentation method used in Library prep.
fragmentation_method.title: Fragmentation Method
XXXenum: chemical (part of Illumina TruSeq mRNA Kit)

library_size_selection_method.description: The experimental method used to size-select the nucleic acid during Library prep.

lysis_method.description: A short description of the cell lysis method used in Library prep.
lysis_method.title: Lysis Method

size_range.description: The measured size range of the purified nucleic acid, in kD
size_range.title: Size Range

paired_ended.description: Whether or not the library was prepared with paired ends
paired_ended.title: Paired Ended

strand_specificity.description: Whether or not the library was prepared in a strand-specific manner
strand_specificity.title: Strand Specificity
